skillTree.localised_description: An officer's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Excellent Cathayan chariots, barded by expert metalsmiths for extra protection on the battlefield but at no cost in speed or agility.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.
The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: There must be balance in all things... and yet to place a hand on the scale in one direction can also be necessary
A reward for his long and excellent service, the armour that the officer wears can turn aside even the heaviest of blows or the most dangerous of magics
Losing a fight is as nothing to failing the dragons of which he is a loyal servant
No matter how large the target, it must stand and be accounted before the Jade Army. It shall not flee... it shall face a reckoning
Only by the cohesive implementation of discipline can the Jade Army hold the line against Chaos

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Jade Army units. 
	(all units in army)

Melee Attack: +5 for Jade Army units.
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: No matter what comes through that gate you will stand your ground, be it man, beast, or corrupted monster. This. Is. CATHAY!

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
When bracing, this unit deals additional damage when attacking charging enemies.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit deals additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Violence is always the answer, even when it's not.
There's nothing wrong with being aware of one's capabilities - particularly when one is capable of so much.
Deception is frowned upon, but only if you're found out.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +35%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: In a battle of wills, one must not falter.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Even Slaanesh would be unable to break this one's self control.
No being can kill what it cannot catch.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If knowledge is power, then this one is powerful indeed.
"The trick is to think two steps ahead… and then think one step ahead of that."
This one could challenge an Ogre to an arm-wrestling match.
If there is anything left to learn about military planning, this one has yet to come across it.
Hardy and resilient, this being stands firm in the face of all challenges.
No arms have yet been forged that this warrior has been unable to master.
When the arrows are spent and the blades are all blunted, this perfect warrior can rely on their well-trained body to keep death from their door.
A place for everything and everything in its place. Live by this motto and Chaos will stand out like the proverbial sore thumb.

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 when fighting against Daemons of Chaos
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some may consider administration a tiresome process, but this servant of the Celestial Emperor knows that a tidy society makes for an efficient, effective one.
An inquisitive nature is only part of the skillset required for the Dragon's questioner, tasked with ensuring harmony prevails over Celestial lands.
